casebody.data:
471 A.2d 1054 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND v. John W. HESSIAN III. Misc. Docket (Subtitle BV) No. 38,

Sept. Term, 1983.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. Jan. 24, 1984.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the consent to disbarment filed by JOHN W. HESSIAN III in accordance with Maryland Rule BV12 d 2, and the written recommendation of Bar Counsel, it is this 24th day of January, 1984

ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that JOHN W. HESSIAN III be, and he is hereby, disbarred by consent from the further practice of law in the State of Maryland; and it is further

ORDERED that the Clerk of this Court shall strike the name of JOHN W. HESSIAN III from the register of attorneys, and pursuant to Maryland Rule BV13, shall certi*633fy that fact to the Trustees of the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the clerks of all judicial tribunals in the State.
